org.spongepowered.api.event.message

Interface MessageEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Event, GameEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PlayerChatEvent, PlayerDeathEvent, PlayerJoinEvent, PlayerKickEvent, PlayerMessageEvent, PlayerQuitEvent

    public interface MessageEvent
extends GameEvent
    Describes events when a CommandSource sends a Text message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Text getMessage()
      Gets the Text message created by the CommandSource before the calling of this event.
      Text getNewMessage()
      Gets the currently set Text message.
      MessageSink getSink()
      Gets the current sink that this message will be sent to.
      CommandSource getSource()
      Gets the CommandSource of the event which may or may not be a target of the Text.
      void setNewMessage(Text message)
      Sets the Text message.
      void setSink(MessageSink sink)
      Set the target for this message to go to.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.GameEvent

        getGame

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.Event

        getCallbacks

    • Method Detail

      • getSource

        CommandSource getSource()
        Gets the CommandSource of the event which may or may not be a target of the Text.
        Returns:
        The source

      • getMessage

        Text getMessage()
        Gets the Text message created by the CommandSource before the calling of this event.
        Returns:
        The message

      • getNewMessage

        Text getNewMessage()
        Gets the currently set Text message.
        Returns:
        The message

      • setNewMessage

        void setNewMessage(Text message)
        Sets the Text message.
        Parameters:
        message - The new message

      • getSink

        MessageSink getSink()
        Gets the current sink that this message will be sent to.
        Returns:
        The message sink the message in this event will be sent to

      • setSink

        void setSink(MessageSink sink)
        Set the target for this message to go to.
        Parameters:
        sink - The sink to set
